content: Awesome detailed article. Thanks for sharing… following some of your advice:) I’d love your feedback on a tool I’ve built creating viral prelaunch campaigns. I go the idea after reading Tim Ferris’ post about Harry’s Shave Club’s prelaunch campaign that netted them 100k email subscribers in one week. Here’s a link to the product! www.actionpages.co Thanks for taking the time to write this. I’m going to rework my landing page and start executing these strategies next week.:)
